p: The cookie dough was made according to the following recipe: wheat flour (150 g), brewer’s yeast (4 g), sugar (8 g), salt (1.5 g), butter (30 g), vanilla extract (8 drops), corn oil (1 tablespoon), and water (6 tablespoons). All ingredients were mixed thoroughly, and the formed dough was manually extended and cut with a round mold. Cookies were baked in an oven at 220 °C for 18 min and cooled at room temperature.
